biotools.summary: GMQN is a reference based method that removes unwanted technical variations at signal intensity level between samples for 450K and 850K DNA methylation array. It can also easily combined with Subset-quantile Within Array Normalization(SWAN) or Beta-Mixture Quantile (BMIQ) Normalisation to remove probe design bias.

bioschemas.name: GMQN
